actions.name: Approve Onboarding
actions.description: Approve company onboarding and activate their account

fields.description: Set the credit limit for this company
fields.label: Approved Credit Limit (€)

fields.description: Explain why this credit limit was approved
fields.label: Justification Notes

fields.description: Allow this company to use invoice factoring
fields.label: Enable Factoring Service

fields.description: Allow this company to request retention guarantees
fields.label: Enable Guarantees Service

actions.name: Escalate
actions.description: Escalate company onboarding for additional review

fields.description: Explain why this company needs escalation
fields.label: Escalation Reason

actions.name: Reject Onboarding
actions.description: Reject company onboarding and suspend their account

fields.description: Explain why this company's onboarding is being rejected
fields.label: Rejection Reason

fields.description: Notify the company about the rejection via email
fields.label: Send notification email to company

actions.name: Request More Info
actions.description: Request additional information or documents from the customer

fields.description: Extract K-bis de moins de 3 mois
fields.label: 📋 K-bis (company registration)

fields.description: Relevé d'identité bancaire
fields.label: 🏦 RIB (bank details)

fields.description: Carte d'identité du gérant
fields.label: 🪪 ID Card of legal representative

fields.description: Attestation de vigilance URSSAF à jour
fields.label: 📜 URSSAF Certificate

fields.description: Assurance responsabilité civile professionnelle
fields.label: 🛡️ Professional Liability Insurance (RCC)

fields.description: Bilan comptable de l'année N-1
fields.label: 📊 Financial Statements (Bilan)

fields.description: Assurance décennale pour le BTP
fields.label: 🏗️ 10-Year Insurance (Décennale)

fields.description: Certification Qualibat
fields.label: ⭐ Qualibat Certification (optional)

fields.description: Statuts de l'entreprise
fields.label: 📄 Company Statutes

fields.description: Any additional information or specific requirements
fields.label: Additional notes (optional)

layout.content: Please select the documents that are missing (these will be requested from the customer):

actions.name: Update Document Status
actions.description: Update the status of a KYC document

fields.description: Select the new status for this document
fields.label: New Status

fields.description: Add any notes about this document review
fields.label: Notes

fields.description: Required if status is Rejected - explain why the document was rejected
fields.label: Rejection Reason
